title: How to Avoid the Ghosting Effects in Broadcast TV Reception

steps.headline: Check all the wires that are connected to the TV.
steps.description: take a look to the wires like the cable connection,tighten all of it.

steps.headline: Get someone to help.
steps.description: ask someone to help you in fixing the ghosting effect in your TV screen.

steps.headline: Have a helper to get on the roof.
steps.description: If the checking in all the wires that are connected to your TV have no unable to cause the TV screen then try to check the antenna.get someone to climb up to the roof where your antenna was located.

steps.headline: Find the antenna.
steps.description: try to find your antenna to check some of the ability that causes your TV into ghosting.

steps.headline: Stay besides the TV.
steps.description: check the TV while the helper goes up on the roof to manipulate the antenna to minimize ghosts.

steps.headline: Wait for the result.
steps.description: wait until the ghosting in your TV screen will disappear then give a sign to the helper that it is fix.
